item.title: Install Ubuntu 14.04 on Chromebook
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: I am always looking for different ways that I can extend the capabilityÂ of my Chromebook. It’s not that I don’t like Chrome OS, but sometimes I need to launch a C compiler or run java apps when I am away from home. I might even get in the mood to play Minecraft during a long car ride. Luckily, there is an easy answer to all of this.
